article.title: Alakai to Upgrade Explosive Detection Systems
article.text: Alakai Defense Systems Incorporated, Largo, Florida, was awarded a $8,734,134 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract, with options, for Check Point Explosives Detection Systems-2 (CPEDS-2) upgrades for detecting bulk home-made explosives and precursors in the field. The Army Contracting Command, Research Triangle Park Division, Research Triangle Park, North Carolina, is the contracting activity (W911NF-14-C-0156).
